GrandChallenge.name: Sustainable Energy Development
GrandChallenge.description: Develop sustainable energy systems to combat climate change.

Goal.name: Increase Renewable Energy Usage
Goal.description: Achieve 80% renewable energy usage worldwide by 2050.
Goal.metric: Percentage of global energy derived from renewable sources

Research.name: Perovskite Stability Research
Research.description: Investigate methods to improve the stability of perovskite cells under various conditions.

Research.name: Solar Panel Recycling
Research.description: Develop methods to recycle solar panels and reduce waste.

Impacts.name: Reduced Carbon Emissions
Impacts.description: Significant reduction in greenhouse gas emissions.

Scope.name: Global Scope
Scope.description: Addressing energy needs worldwide with a focus on sustainable practices.

Stakeholders.name: Governments
Stakeholders.description: Policy makers supporting renewable energy initiatives.
